entry.title: Reply to reply
entry.content:
…replying to my previous reply I was looking at uses.tech website. I wondered how I can have an animated favicon because this is probably the first time I saw one.

Then I came accross this: an arcade game played in the favicon. How cool is that!
entry.summary: …replying to my previous reply I was looking at uses.tech website. I wondered how I can have an animated favicon because this is probably the first time I saw one.
